column4: Carnegie unit is specified as the type of credits or units of value awarded for the completion of a course.
Semester hour credit is specified as the type of credits or units of value awarded for the completion of a course.
Trimester hour credit is specified as the type of credits or units of value awarded for the completion of a course.
Quarter hour credit is specified as the type of credits or units of value awarded for the completion of a course.
Quinmester hour credit is specified as the type of credits or units of value awarded for the completion of a course.
Mini-term hour credit is specified as the type of credits or units of value awarded for the completion of a course.
Summer term hour credit is specified as the type of credits or units of value awarded for the completion of a course.
Intersession hour credit is specified as the type of credits or units of value awarded for the completion of a course.
Long session hour credit is specified as the type of credits or units of value awarded for the completion of a course.
Twelve month hour credit is specified as the type of credits or units of value awarded for the completion of a course.
Career and Technical Education credit is specified as the type of credits or units of value awarded for the completion of a course.
Adult high school credit is specified as the type of credits or units of value awarded for the completion of a course.
Credit by examination is specified as the type of credits or units of value awarded for the completion of a course.
Correspondence credit is specified as the type of credits or units of value awarded for the completion of a course.
Converted occupational experience credit is specified as the type of credits or units of value awarded for the completion of a course.
Other is specified as the type of credits or units of value awarded for the completion of a course.
Credit that is issued or accepted for certificates.  Includes credits earned while enrolled in a certificate program.
Credit that is issued or is accepted as credit for earning a college-level degree.Includes credits earned while enrolled in a postsecondary program for a college-level degree.
Credit that is issued or is accepted as education units for meeting professional requirements.
One contact hour of instruction, presentation or study.
